mapper.sql: a.txid AS "txid", a.app_name AS "appName", a.server_ip AS "serverIp", a.req_time AS "reqTime", a.http_status AS "httpStatus", a.req_url_path AS "reqUrlPath", a.counts AS "counts", a.pre_counts AS "preCounts", a.resp_time AS "respTime", a.pre_resp_time AS "preRespTime", a.size AS "size", a.pre_size AS "preSize", a.req_date AS "reqDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ods_nginx_tourism( txid, app_name, server_ip, req_time, http_status, req_url_path, counts, pre_counts, resp_time, pre_resp_time, size, pre_size, req_date ) VALUES ( #{txid}, #{appName}, #{serverIp}, #{reqTime}, #{httpStatus}, #{reqUrlPath}, #{counts}, #{preCounts}, #{respTime}, #{preRespTime}, #{size}, #{preSize}, #{reqDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ods_nginx_tourism SET txid = #{txid}, app_name = #{appName}, server_ip = #{serverIp}, req_time = #{reqTime}, http_status = #{httpStatus}, req_url_path = #{reqUrlPath}, counts = #{counts}, pre_counts = #{preCounts}, resp_time = #{respTime}, pre_resp_time = #{preRespTime}, size = #{size}, pre_size = #{preSize}, req_date = #{reqDate} WHERE id = #{id}
